title: Data Scientist
description: AnalyticaAI is seeking a skilled Data Scientist to join our research team. You will work on developing and implementing machine learning models to solve complex business problems and extract actionable insights from large datasets.
responsibilities: Design and implement machine learning models for predictive analytics
Process, clean, and verify the integrity of data used for analysis
Develop data visualization solutions to present findings
Collaborate with engineering teams to deploy models to production
Stay current with latest ML research and implement new methodologies
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
3+ years of professional experience in data science or machine learning
Strong knowledge of Python and data science libraries (pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow)
Experience with SQL and data visualization tools
Understanding of statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms
Familiarity with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
nice_to_have: Experience with cloud-based ML platforms (AWS SageMaker, Azure ML)
Published research in machine learning or data science
education: Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
